entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:22 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:22 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
